idea: The problems of the people are increasing day by day. But the problem is not getting solved. With Dial the Problem, people's problems can be solved.
name: Dial The Problem

idea: Lucro is the only integrated waste management company in India that collects, segregates, washes and recycled post-consumer flexible and rigid plastic waste.
name: LUCRO PLASTECYCLE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Cloud ERP for the unorganized textile sector. We aim to embed existing processes of businesses into the software instead of making business follow unnecessary flows not suited to them.
name: AUGEAN ENTERPRISE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Internet is creating a new paradigm in retailing, reinventing new business models, and forever changing the ways firms conduct their business. By making an immense amount of information and data readily available, the Internet has provided consumers with the ability to access and navigate in this space. Since its inception, the Internet has transformed from merely an information space to a marketplace, adding online execution and transaction capabilities. Notably, online trading, a popular notion among retail investors, is one of the most successful industries created by the Internet revolution.

 

With such facilities of online trading comes the high risk of monetary losses where inexperienced personnel can easily be lured into huge losses under the pretext of earning easy & fast money. To make investors aware of such risks & give them a hands-on real time trading experience without the risk of losing money, GameOfTrade introduces you to this trading experience as a “Game Of Skill” where all types of users, Novice, Experienced & Experts can try out various aspects of online trading and gain valuable experience before actually diving into the ocean of online trading.

 

GameOfTrade is a Gaming Company with focus on creating online stock trading games for broking trading industry. The flagship product of the Company is known as “VirtuoTrade”. Making use of virtual trading games to learn about live trading provides users with virtual money to add various asset classes like shares, commodities, and mutual funds to your portfolio. Their price fluctuation affects your portfolio & you can compare your performance against that of your peers, competitors & experts. These application platforms help users gain insight into other people’s trading strategies. Gaming platforms also teach users about automated trading strategies and technical analysis.

 

The Company has been incorporated by 2 Co-founders having over 20 years of experience in the financial domain and over 7 years in the business of creating online trading platforms used by top stock brokerages in the Indian industry. With this wealth of experience in the trading domain, the management team wants to use this game as a self-educating method and experience for people without the actual risk of losing money at the hands of experienced traders and investors.
name: GAMEOFTRADE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Established in the year 2017, White Life Farm, a Maharashtra-based company primarily involved in the manufacturing, processing, and packaging of the A2 cow (Indian breed) milk and milk products. Since the milk industry is dumped with adulterated products with misleading information, White Life Farm was born to provide true, 100% natural products with 0% adulteration or preservatives. With a processing capacity of 3,0000 liters a day, White Life Farm is all set to lead the revolution against adulteration by providing the highest quality of products.

Setting new standards of purity with its multiple product lines, the company offers A2 milk, A2 ghee, A2 unsalted Butter, A2 Paneer, A2 kharwas, and naturally grown vegetables and fruits. The company prides itself on setting higher standards of freshness and transparency for the milk industry to strive towards.
name: WHITE LIFE FARM

idea: The proprietor of the registered proprietary company with motive of business through social upliftment
name: Sarvodaya International

idea:
The company known as Treta Marketing And Services Private Limited offers a wide variety of services via the internet. Treta Marketing & Services has released a number of applications, websites, and an online television platform (OTT) for spiritual content. Our primary concentration is placed on our recently released OTT platform which goes by the name "Pragya OTT." The primary goal of Pragya is to become a digital version of "SPIRITUAL DHAM." Full spiritual content, lightning-fast performance, user-friendly navigation, and live assistance are some of the features included in our services. Always and at all times, twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week. The following is a summary of the mobile application: 

Joining various social media platforms Users can sign up for the app by logging in with one of their social media accounts, such as Facebook, Gmail, or any of the other available options. This enables users to sign up in a more expedient manner
name: TRETA MARKETING AND SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at Earnnest strive to democratize access to institutional quality investment opportunities, making them affordable to individuals & families. And at the same time, create credit access to capital deficient sectors and their supply chain.
name: CERTUS INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
M/S. Shourmya International Logistics Private Limited (SIL) is promoted by Mr. Subhrarabinda Birabar, an IIMA Alumnus and Mrs. Soni Laila Birabar, a qualified Chartered Accountant with having a combined industry experience of more than 50 years in the field of International Logistics, Shipping, Ports, Free Zones, Trading, Real Estate, Automobile, Manufacturing and Audit.

SIL is formed primarily to provide services to International Maritime Trade. International Maritime Trade forms more than 70% of EXIM business of India. This includes in trading of Bulk, Break-Bulk, Containers, Automobiles, Agricultural Products at various Major and Minor Ports of India. To facilitate the entities involved in the international maritime trade, SIL has envisaged to offer following services in phase-wise manner.

1. Supervision of cargo loading and unloading from the vessels

2. Undertaking loading/ unloading operations from vessels

3. Inter-carting the cargo/ containers/ vehicles from and to storage yard from and to the vessel side

4. Tallying of cargo/ containers/ vehicles

5. Providing Pre Dispatch Inspection (PDI) Services for export oriented vehicle/ equipment

6. Leasing of vehicles for maritime service providers/ terminals

7. Washing/ cleaning services for the export oriented vehicles/ equipments

8. Transportation services for cargo/ containers/ vehicles

9. Creation of multilevel cargo storage area for cargo/ vehicles/ equipment

10. Advisory and consultancy services to the maritime industry

11. Developing Maritime Infrastructure on BOOST basis
name: SHOURMYA INTERNATIONAL LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Nothing Swim is a brand I have created to fill the large gaps in the swimwear market for Indian and Asian women. Nothing Swim was conceptualized in 2017 and we have done two successful trial design runs and got great feedback on our products.

The test runs of NOTH!NG Swim have been extremely encouraging. The post-covid travel market in 2022 is ripe for the picking and a great time to launch. We're looking to seize the market and grow.


I am now looking to raise investment to launch the first full collection of Nothing Swim and make my brand dream a reality. For the same I am looking for investors who can share our vision and bring essential guidance to make this happen.
name: NOTHING Swim
